ARABIC: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But you will not will unless Allah wills. Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But you will not desire except as God wills. Verily He is all-knowing and all-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But your willing shall be of no avail until Allah Himself so wills. Surely Allah is All-Knowing, Most Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (The virtuous mentioned in this chapter) want only what God wants. God is All-knowing and All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And what will you wish, except if Allah wills; indeed Allah is All Knowing, Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But you cannot will, unless Allah wills. Verily, Allah is Ever All-Knowing, All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And you do not please except that Allah please, surely Allah is Knowing, Wise;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But you will not unless God wills; surely God is ever All-knowing, All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Yet ye will not, unless Allah willeth. Lo! Allah is Knower, Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But you cannot will it unless God wills [to show you that way] -- God is indeed all-knowing and wise --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And ye will not, unless Allah willeth. Verily Allah is ever Knowing, Wise.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But you will not wish unless it is willed by Allah. Indeed Allah is all-knowing, all-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But ye will not, except as Allah wills; for Allah is full of Knowledge and Wisdom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But you cannot will, unless Allah wills. Verily, Allah is Ever All-Knowing, All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Yet you will not unless Allah wills; surely, Allah is the Knower, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Yet you cannot will, unless God wills. God is Knowing and Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [76:30] But you will not (tashā’ūna, may also be read yashā’ūna, ‘they will’), choose a way through obedience,   unless God wills, this. Assuredly God is ever Knower, of His creatures, Wise, in what He does.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Yet ye will not) good or evil, faith or disbelief, (unless Allah willeth) that you will it. (Lo! Allah is Knower) of what you will whether it is good or evil, (Wise) He decreed that you do not will anything of good or evil except that which He wills.
